promoMessage: Generate questions that are easier to answer!

topic.label: Question Topic
topic.placeholder: useState not synchronized with input change

technologies.label: Used technologies that concern the question

expected.label: What should be happening vs what is happening
expected.placeholder: When I input the message, and click the copy button, the message should be copied to the clipboard, but it is empty.

whatTried.label: What did you try to solve the problem?
whatTried.placeholder: I tried to solve the problem by using the useState hook.

sources.label: What sources did you read in order to solve the problem?

success.title: Success
success.message: The question was copied to the clipboard!

error.title: Error
error.message: The question could not be copied to the clipboard

noData: You need to enter data in at least one of the fields
